meanings.definition: Someone who is excessively concerned with minor details or faults.
meanings.sent1: My sister is the nitpickiest person I know when it comes to organizing her room.
meanings.sent2: The nitpickiest member of the team always points out spelling errors in our documents.
meanings.sent3: The nitpickiest student in class noticed a tiny smudge on the whiteboard and insisted on cleaning it.
meanings.sent4: Being the nitpickiest detective, she could spot the smallest clue that others overlooked.
meanings.sent5: The nitpickiest chef in the kitchen could taste the slightest difference in seasoning.

meanings.definition: The act of finding fault with small, unimportant details.
meanings.sent1: Her constant nitpickiest about the font size of the presentation annoyed her colleagues.
meanings.sent2: The editor's nitpickiest delayed the publication of the article.
meanings.sent3: During the meeting, his nitpickiest about the meeting room temperature made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The nitpickiest of the art critic could spot imperfections in the masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The nitpickiest of the judges noticed a small error in the contestant's performance.
